parameters.formDescription: = These release notes for APM-Tool updates‚Äîshowcasing new features, changes, and bug fixes.

parameters.text:
=Search in {{ $json.bodyContent }}:
1) Find the URL link for the latest release version:
- If {{ $json.dynatraceComponent }} is equal to ‚Äúmanaged‚Äù, search for URL links that contain the word ‚ÄúVersion‚Äù.
- If {{ $json.dynatraceComponent }} is not equal to ‚Äúmanaged‚Äù, search for URL links that contain the word ‚Äú{{ $json.dynatraceComponent }}‚Äù.

2) Find the latest release number and the full URL to the latest release page.

3) additionally output "dynatraceOutput" field, containing the value {{ $json.dynatraceComponent }} in case-sensitive format

nodes.name: ü§ñ AI Agent ‚Äî Find Latest Release URL

parameters.text:
=1. Read the ENTIRE page content: https://docs.dynatrace.com/managed{{ $json.output.latestRelease.url }}
2. Extract and categorize the information into the following specific sections:
- BREAKING CHANGES: Extract any breaking changes, deprecations, removed features, or changes. If none exist, state "No breaking changes reported for this version."

- ANNOUNCEMENTS: Extract important announcements, general information, roadmap updates, or high-level communications about the {{ $json['[\'Select the Dynatrace elements:\']'] }} release. If none exist, state "No major announcements for this version.

- TECHNOLOGY SUPPORT: Extract information about technology support updates, platform compatibility changes, new supported technologies, operating system support, or infrastructure requirements. If none exist, state "No technology support updates for this version".

- NEW FEATURES: Extract new features, capabilities, enhancements, or functionality additions introduced in this version. If none exist, state "No new features in this version."

- RESOLVED ISSUES: Extract bug fixes, resolved issues, performance improvements, or stability enhancements. If none exist, state "No resolved issues reported for this version."

Please ensure you access the complete content of the release notes and categorize each piece of information appropriately.

3. additionally output "dynatraceOutput" field, containing the value {{ $json.output.dynatraceComponent }}

parameters.content:
Routing & HTTP Requests
Nodes that route per-component and perform HTTP requests to respective docs pages. These nodes feed the extractor and AI agents.

Form / Trigger
This group contains the form trigger that starts the workflow and splits selected Dynatrace components for processing. Inputs: selected components and summary format.

URL Finder Group
Contains nodes that fetch component-specific 'what's new' pages and an AI agent that extracts the latest release URL and version for each component.

Summarizer Group
This cluster runs the AI summarizer agent and its language model. It reads the fetched release notes page content and extracts categorized sections (Breaking changes, Announcements, New features, Resolved issues).

Aggregation / HTML / Email
Aggregates parsed summaries, generates the HTML report, creates final HTML document and emails the result. Outputs: HTML summary and email sent.
